'''Meal Box by Smiley Yanxiao for Jiangxue''' is a [[Quest Item]] that is packed by [[Smiley Yanxiao]] during the {{Quest|Yanxiao's Dilemma}}.

It is a food item made specifically for [[Jiangxue]], containing [[Jueyun Chili]] and [[Lotus Head]] ingredients.
